Room.Name: Phexton Village Community Warehouse
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the village warehouse, and see a long hall of locked rooms.
Room.LongDescription: There is a wide stairway, with steps so far spaced you would have to hoist yourself up to climb them. There is also a hole in one wall which you could probably crawl through. If it wasn't so big, you would swear it was a mouse hole.
